# Threading Docs

## Barrier

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/barrier.md): Learn more about: Barrier
- [Synchronize concurrent operations with a Barrier](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-synchronize-concurrent-operations-with-a-barrier.md): Learn more about: How to: Synchronize Concurrent Operations with a Barrier

## Cancel threads

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md): Understand cancellation in managed threads. Learn about cancellation tokens in cooperative cancellation of asynchronous or long-running synchronous operations.
- [Cancel threads cooperatively](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/canceling-threads-cooperatively.md): Learn more about: Canceling threads cooperatively

## How-tos

- [Listen for cancellation requests by polling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-listen-for-cancellation-requests-by-polling.md): Learn more about: How to: Listen for Cancellation Requests by Polling
- [Register callbacks for cancellation requests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-register-callbacks-for-cancellation-requests.md): Learn more about: Register callbacks for cancellation requests
- [Listen for cancellation requests that have wait handles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-listen-for-cancellation-requests-that-have-wait-handles.md): Learn more about: How to: Listen for Cancellation Requests That Have Wait Handles
- [Listen for multiple cancellation requests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-listen-for-multiple-cancellation-requests.md): Learn more about: How to: Listen for Multiple Cancellation Requests

## Managed threading basics

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-basics.md): See links to other managed threading articles, covering topics such as exceptions, synchronizing data, foreground & background threads, local storage, and more.
- [Threads and threading](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/threads-and-threading.md): Learn about threading, such as processes & threads, when to use multiple threads, & how to use multithreading to increase responsiveness or throughput in .NET.
- [Exceptions in managed threads](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md): See how unhandled exceptions are handled in .NET. Most unhandled thread exceptions proceed naturally and lead to application termination.
- [Synchronize data for multithreading](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/synchronizing-data-for-multithreading.md): Learn how to synchronize data for multithreading in .NET. Choose strategies such as synchronized code regions, manual synchronization, or synchronized contexts.
- [Foreground and background threads](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/foreground-and-background-threads.md): Determine or change whether a thread is a background thread or a foreground thread using the Thread.IsBackground property in .NET.
- [Managed and unmanaged threading in windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/managed-and-unmanaged-threading-in-windows.md): Learn more about: Managed and unmanaged threading in Windows
- [Thread local storage: Thread-relative static fields and data slots](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md): Learn more about: Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots

## SpinLock

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/spinlock.md): Learn more about: SpinLock
- [Use SpinLock for low-level synchronization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-use-spinlock-for-low-level-synchronization.md): Learn more about: How to: use SpinLock for low-level synchronization
- [Enable thread-tracking mode in SpinLock](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-enable-thread-tracking-mode-in-spinlock.md): Learn more about: How to: Enable Thread-Tracking Mode in SpinLock

## SpinWait

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/spinwait.md): Learn more about: SpinWait
- [Use SpinWait to implement a two-phase wait operation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/how-to-use-spinwait-to-implement-a-two-phase-wait-operation.md): Learn more about: How to: Use SpinWait to Implement a Two-Phase Wait Operation

## Threading

- [Best practices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md): Learn managed threading best practices in .NET. Work with difficult situations such as coordinating many threads or handling blocking threads.

## Threading objects and features

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/threading-objects-and-features.md): Learn more about: Threading objects and features
- [The managed thread pool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md): Learn about the .NET thread pool that provides background worker threads
- [Timers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/threading/timers.md): Learn what .NET timers to use in a multithreaded environment.
